description:
Keep Jack Frost at bay with these GORE-TEX Infinium tights. With wind-proof panels at the front to stop wind chill and fleecy brushed insides to keep you cozy, post adventure cocoa becomes less about warming up and more about enjoyment.

  • GORE-TEX INFINIUM™ WINDSTOPPER® fabric at the front stops wind dead in its tracks, while the back allows heat to get out keeping you cool while you push your limits
  • 4-way stretch ensures flexibility in all directions, letting you move how you want
  • Treated with PFC-free DWR for water resistance for and light rain or flurries that come your way
  • Brushed back adds warmth and softness giving you all-day comfort
  • Elastic waistband for easy layering
  • Reflective details add visibility and safety on those low light runs
name: Salomon Gore-Tex Infinium Windstopper Tights - Men's
